question:
Monkey and crocodile    one day a monkey wanted to cross a river. he saw a crocodile in the river, so he asked the crocodile to take him across the other side. the crocodile told the monkey to jump on its back. then the crocodile swam down the river.
now, the crocodile was very hungry, so when it was in the middle of the river, it stopped and said to the monkey, "monkey, my father is very sick. he must eat the heart of the monkey. then he will be strong again."
the monkey thought for a while. then he told the crocodile to swim back to the river bank.
"what’s for?" asked the crocodile.
"because i didn’t bring my heart with me," said the monkey. "i left it under the tree, near some coconuts."
so, the crocodile turned around and swam back to the bank of the river. as soon as they reached the river bank, the monkey jumped off the crocodile’s back and climbed up to the top of a tree.
"where is your heart?" asked the crocodile.

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Monyet dan buaya

suatu hari monyet ingin menyeberangi sungai. dia melihat buaya di sungai, jadi dia meminta buaya untuk membawanya ke seberang. buaya menyuruh monyet untuk melompat di atasnya

□Bhs.inggris□​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

I have a smartphone. It is one of many sophisticated things that I've ever had. I use my smartphone to communicate with my family and friends. I don't have any game apps in my smartphone because I don't like to play games with my smartphone. I just like to watch youtube videos and tik tok videos on my smartphone. I also use my smartphone to communicate with google assistant. I enjoy communicating with that artificial intelligence because it's really cool! I can also practice speaking English with my google assistant. I feel happy to have my smartphone. Thank you.

Penjelasan:

Aku memiliki sebuah telepon pintar. Telpon pintarku adalah salah satu dari banyak hal canggih yang pernah kumiliki. Aku menggunakan smartphoneku untuk berkomunikasi dengan keluarga dan teman-temanku. Aku tidak memiliki aplikasi game di smartphoneku karena aku tidak suka bermain game dengan smartphoneku. Aku hanya suka menonton video youtube dan video tik tok di smartphoneku. Aku juga menggunakan smartphoneku untuk berkomunikasi dengan google asisten. Aku senang berkomunikasi dengan kecerdasan buatan tersebut karena sangat keren! Aku juga bisa berlatih berbicara bahasa Inggris dengan google asistenku. Aku merasa senang memiliki smartphoneku. Terima kasih.

Semoga membantu ya.

Jawaban:

prosperous life is always expected by everybody

related_questions.question:
Last Saturday, my sister Dina, did    something funny. She got up very late, at
six. She ran fast to the bathroom. She took
very quick bath, got dressed, took her bag,
and ran off to school. She did not even have
breakfast. After walking for five minutes,
she noticed that no other children were
going to school. Soon she realized it was
Saturday! So she walked back home. We
laughed at her when she got home. She also
laughed at herself.
